1PASSWORD.name: 1Password
1PASSWORD.tagline: Human-centric security to safeguard your most important information—at work, at home, and everywhere in between
1PASSWORD.overview: 1Password is a Canadian password management company founded in 2005 by Dave Teare and Roustem Karimov. The company provides secure password vaults for individuals and enterprises. 1Password raised $620M Series C in January 2022 at $6.8B valuation—the largest funding round in Canadian history. ARR surpassed $400M in October 2025, with 75%+ revenue from business customers and 180K business accounts. Gross retention exceeds 90%. In October 2025, founders completed a $100M secondary sale. CEO David Faugno confirmed IPO consideration for 2026-2027. Notable celebrity investors include Ryan Reynolds, Robert Downey Jr., and Justin Timberlake.

products.name: 1Password Personal/Family
products.description: Password manager for individuals and families

products.name: 1Password Business
products.description: Enterprise password and secrets management

products.name: 1Password Enterprise
products.description: Advanced security controls and SSO integration

products.name: 1Password Developer Tools
products.description: Secret management for developers (CLI, SSH)

products.name: Passage by 1Password
products.description: Passkey authentication platform (acquired)

products.name: 1Password Extended Access Management
products.description: Device trust and access management

highlights.text: CEO confirmed IPO consideration 2026-2027
ARR surpassed $400M (Oct 2025)
Founders completed $100M secondary (Oct 2025)
180K business customers, 75%+ B2B revenue
Gross retention above 90%, cash-flow positive
$620M Series C—largest Canadian funding round ($6.8B valuation)

highlights.title: Partnership with Perplexity—launch partner for Comet AI browser with secure credential management
Halo Fund flagship investment—$75M stake from Ryan Smith's billion-dollar growth fund

funding_rounds.investors_html: ICONIQ Growth, Tiger Global, Lightspeed, Accel

1X.name: 1X Technologies
1X.tagline: Building humanoid robots that work alongside humans in homes and workplaces
1X.overview: 1X Technologies (formerly Halodi Robotics) is a Norwegian-American humanoid robotics company founded in 2014 by roboticist Bernt Øivind Børnich. The company develops general-purpose humanoid robots for home environments. 1X's NEO robot is designed as a personal assistant. In September 2025, 1X entered talks to raise up to $1B at a $10B+ valuation—12x higher than its January 2024 valuation. The company is backed by OpenAI Startup Fund, Tiger Global, and EQT Ventures. Headquarters in Palo Alto with manufacturing in Moss, Norway.

products.name: NEO
products.description: Humanoid robot for home assistance

products.name: EVE
products.description: Commercial humanoid robot

products.name: 1X Operating System
products.description: AI-powered robot control

products.name: Revo1 Motors
products.description: High-torque direct drive servomotors

highlights.text: Seeking $1B at $10B+ valuation (Sep 2025)
12x valuation growth from Jan 2024
Raised $100M Series B (Jan 2024)
Backed by OpenAI Startup Fund
EQT Ventures led Series B
NEO robot for home environments

highlights.title: NEO pre-orders open—$20,000 humanoid robot for homes, launching 2026 with $499/month subscription
TechCrunch: Deal to send humanoids to factories
highlights.description: TechCrunch: Deal to send humanoids to factories

01AI.name: 01.AI
01AI.tagline: Building world-class open-source AI models to democratize artificial intelligence
01AI.overview: 01.AI (零一万物) is a Beijing-based artificial intelligence company founded in March 2023 by Kai-Fu Lee, former President of Google China and founder of Sinovation Ventures. The company achieved unicorn status ($1B valuation) in just eight months—one of the fastest in AI history. 01.AI's Yi series models consistently rank among the top open-source LLMs globally, with Yi-Lightning surpassing GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Sonnet to rank #6 worldwide and #1 in China on LMSYS benchmarks. Notable for training world-class models with just 2,000 GPUs at $3M cost (2% of competitors). In January 2025, 01.AI formed a joint industrial AI lab with Alibaba Cloud to develop enterprise solutions. The company generated ¥100M revenue in 2024 and is pivoting to B2B AI solutions leveraging DeepSeek and other open models.

products.name: Yi-Lightning
products.description: Flagship LLM using Mixture-of-Experts architecture, ranked #6 globally and #1 in China on LMSYS, surpassing GPT-4o at 14¢/M tokens

products.name: Yi-34B
products.description: Open-source 34B parameter foundation model matching GPT-3.5 performance, Apache 2.0 licensed on Hugging Face

products.name: Yi-VL-34B
products.description: Vision-language model ranked #1 globally on MMMU and CMMMU multimodal benchmarks

products.name: Yi-Coder
products.description: Code generation model supporting 52 programming languages with 128K context window

products.name: Wanzhi (万知)
products.description: Free AI productivity assistant for documents, spreadsheets, and presentations—China's answer to Office Copilot

products.name: Yi-1.5
products.description: Upgraded model series with enhanced coding, math, and reasoning capabilities, fine-tuned on 3M diverse samples, available in 6B, 9B, and 34B variants

products.name: Yi-34B-200K
products.description: Extended context foundation model with 200K token context window, achieving 99.8% accuracy on Needle-in-a-Haystack tests

products.name: WanZhi Enterprise Platform
products.description: One-stop enterprise platform for deploying DeepSeek, Qwen, and Yi models with pre-equipped GPUs, targeting SMBs with rapid AI deployment

1047-GAMES.name: 1047 Games
1047-GAMES.tagline: Creators of Splitgate—the portal-based arena shooter that redefined competitive FPS gaming
1047-GAMES.overview: Developer of competitive multiplayer games combining portal mechanics with arena shooter gameplay. The company focuses on fast-paced first-person shooter experiences, innovative movement systems, and cross-platform competitive gaming. It helps gamers experience unique sci-fi combat through seamless portal-based navigation and tactical arena design. The company provides the Splitgate franchise featuring portal warfare, Unreal Engine-powered game technology, and competitive esports infrastructure. It promotes innovation in the free-to-play multiplayer shooter genre through community-driven development and classic arena combat philosophy.

products.name: Splitgate: Arena Reloaded
products.description: Back-to-basics portal shooter combining best elements of original and sequel—classic arena combat without factions or abilities, new Railgun power weapon, five new maps, rebuilt progression system, and simplified battle pass launching December 17, 2025

products.name: Portal Combat System
products.description: Proprietary gameplay mechanic allowing players to create inter-dimensional portals for strategic movement and combat advantages—see enemies through portals, create flanking routes, and execute impossible shots across 15 maps

products.name: Cross-Platform Multiplayer
products.description: Full cross-play support across PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store)—unified matchmaking and progression system enabling seamless competitive play

products.name: Ranked Competitive Mode
products.description: Skill-based ranked system featuring SBMM matchmaking, seasonal rankings, competitive playlists, and esports-ready tournament infrastructure with Bitcoin rewards through ZBD partnership

products.name: Classic Arena Mode
products.description: Even-start gameplay mode with map weapon pickups—no loadouts or abilities, pure skill-based combat reminiscent of classic arena shooters like Halo and Quake

highlights.text: Dec 5, 2025—Splitgate: Arena Reloaded announced for December 17 launch—back-to-basics reboot with Railgun, new maps, rebuilt progression
Dec 4, 2025—Splitgate 2 rebooted as Arena Reloaded—combines best of original and sequel, removes factions and abilities
Dec 4, 2025—Arena Reloaded revealed at PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted—seven months after Splitgate 2 went back to drawing board
July 23, 2025—1047 Games pulls Splitgate 2 back to beta: 'We rushed certain features, made boneheaded mistakes'
July 2025—45 employees laid off, co-founders forgo salaries; original Splitgate servers shutting down to cut costs
June 21, 2025—First round of layoffs (10-15% of staff) following rocky Splitgate 2 launch
June 6, 2025—Splitgate 2 launches on PC and consoles; CEO's 'Make FPS Great Again' hat sparks controversy at Summer Game Fest
May 22, 2025—Splitgate 2 open beta launches with 25 weapons, 15 maps, and 10 modes
Sep 2025—VentureBeat interview: How 1047 Games put VC money to use building Splitgate 2
Sep 2021—1047 Games raises $100M at $1.5B valuation after 13M Splitgate downloads—Lightspeed leads
Sep 2021—$100M funding round backed by Insight Partners after breakthrough summer success
Aug 2021—Peak 67,724 concurrent Steam players during Season 0; servers overwhelmed by 120K+ total players

1INCH-LABS.name: 1inch Network
1INCH-LABS.tagline: Leading DEX aggregator finding the best swap rates across 400+ liquidity sources in DeFi
1INCH-LABS.overview: Developer of decentralized exchange aggregation protocols and DeFi infrastructure for optimal token swaps across multiple blockchain networks. The company focuses on intelligent trade routing, gas-efficient execution, and cross-chain liquidity aggregation through its Pathfinder algorithm. It helps crypto traders and DeFi users achieve best swap rates with minimal slippage and MEV protection. The company provides the Aggregation Protocol, Fusion+ cross-chain swaps, Limit Order Protocol, and mobile wallet applications. It promotes decentralized finance accessibility through open-source development and multi-chain interoperability.

products.name: Aggregation Protocol
products.description: Core routing engine using Pathfinder algorithm to analyze 400+ DEXs and liquidity pools across 13+ chains, splitting trades across multiple venues for optimal execution with minimal slippage and best swap rates

products.name: Fusion+ Cross-Chain Swaps
products.description: Intent-based atomic swap system enabling gasless, MEV-protected cross-chain transactions across Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, and 12+ EVM networks without bridges through resolver network and Dutch auction pricing

products.name: Limit Order Protocol
products.description: Gasless limit order functionality allowing users to set target prices for token swaps without holding native tokens for gas fees, supporting 112+ permit-enabled tokens including USDC, DAI, AAVE, and UNI

products.name: 1inch Wallet
products.description: Self-custodial mobile wallet for iOS and Android with built-in DEX aggregation, cross-chain swaps, Ledger Nano X hardware wallet integration via Bluetooth, and WalletConnect support for dApps

products.name: 1inch Card
products.description: Web3 debit card in partnership with Mastercard and Baanx for instant crypto-to-fiat conversion, enabling real-world purchases and ATM withdrawals from crypto holdings in UK and EEA regions

products.name: Aqua Protocol
products.description: Shared liquidity layer allowing capital from a single wallet to back multiple DeFi trading strategies simultaneously without compromising user custody, with SDK and bounties up to $100K for developers

highlights.text: Dec 11, 2025—1inch named exclusive swap provider at launch for Ledger Multisig with deep liquidity aggregation and MEV protection
Nov 20, 2025—Coinbase app integrating 1inch Swap API to enhance non-custodial token swaps—largest US client to date
Nov 17, 2025—1inch launches Aqua protocol for shared DeFi liquidity model at Devconnect Buenos Aires
Aug 2025—1inch launches industry-first native Solana–EVM cross-chain swaps without bridges
Jul 14, 2025—SafePal and 1inch partner to give away 300 co-branded hardware wallets to boost DeFi security
Jun 11, 2025—1inch unveils new Pathfinder algorithm with up to 6.5% better swap rates
Jun 2025—1inch reclaims DEX aggregator lead with 60% market share after Solana expansion—up from 32% in March
Feb 6, 2025—1inch integrates ZKsync to boost cross-chain swaps via Fusion+ technology
Nov 25, 2024—1inch reveals Fusion+ cross-chain feature enabling intent-based atomic swaps without bridges
Oct 2024—1inch and Bruce Lee family launch 'seriousLee' DeFi campaign to promote crypto adoption
Apr 8, 2024—1inch introduces Web3 debit card in partnership with Mastercard and Baanx

1KMXC.name: MXC Foundation
1KMXC.tagline: Building the world's largest decentralized IoT network on blockchain
1KMXC.overview: Developer of blockchain-based IoT data networks and low-power wide-area wireless infrastructure for decentralized machine-to-machine communication. The company focuses on LPWAN sensor networks, edge computing, and proof-of-participation mining protocols for IoT data monetization. It helps cities and enterprises capture smart city data through crowdsourced network infrastructure and secure blockchain-powered marketplaces. The company provides the MXProtocol, M2 Pro mining devices, DataDash mobile application, and Moonchain zkEVM Layer 3 blockchain. It promotes democratization of IoT data ownership through tokenized incentive mechanisms and global wireless network coverage.

products.name: MXProtocol
products.description: Decentralized machine-to-machine communication protocol enabling IoT devices to transmit data via LPWAN networks with proof-of-participation consensus, smart bidding for bandwidth, and interchain data markets across permissionless blockchains

products.name: M2 Pro Miner
products.description: Multi-token LPWAN crypto mining device supporting MXC, DHX, and Bitcoin with plug-and-play setup, 20km+ LoRaWAN coverage range, under 5W power consumption, and IP66 weatherproof enclosure for outdoor deployment

products.name: DataDash App
products.description: Mobile application for iOS and Android enabling users to manage M2 Pro miners, stake MXC tokens on Supernodes, mine multiple cryptocurrencies, and monitor IoT network earnings with 24/7 wallet activity tracking

products.name: Moonchain zkEVM
products.description: Layer 3 zero-knowledge EVM blockchain built on Arbitrum providing DePIN-focused infrastructure with enhanced scalability, privacy protection, and low gas fees for IoT applications and smart city deployments

products.name: MatchX Hardware
products.description: Enterprise-grade LPWAN gateways and sensors with listen-before-talk technology, 35km+ range coverage, 10-year battery life sensors, and deep penetration capability for underground and indoor IoT deployments

highlights.text: Jul 2025—Moonchain partners with CyberCharge to launch free Web3 energy devices via Initial Hardware Offering (IHO)
May 2025—MXC token surges 247% after mining reactivation and OKX Wallet integration
May 2024—MXC completes brand upgrade to Moonchain with mainnet and cross-chain product launch
Mar 26, 2024—JDI Ventures invests $10M into MXC Foundation to advance Ethereum's largest DePIN network
2023—MXC becomes first ever Layer 3 on Arbitrum at EDCON 2023 conference
May 2021—MXC Foundation becomes first blockchain IoT project to join Alibaba's IoT Connectivity Alliance
2019—Shanghai Yangpu district partners with MXC for smart city IoT deployment via MXProtocol
2019—MXC brings smart city IoT standard to South Korea with Enlink partnership
Dec 2018—MXProtocol launches in New York City in cooperation with MatchX and Citiesense

1KOMMA5.name: 1KOMMA5°
1KOMMA5.tagline: Europe's leading one-stop shop for CO2-neutral energy, heat, and mobility solutions
1KOMMA5.overview: Developer of integrated home energy systems and AI-powered energy management software for residential decarbonization across Europe and Australia. The company focuses on one-stop installation of solar panels, battery storage, heat pumps, and EV chargers through a network of certified local partners. It helps homeowners achieve carbon neutrality while reducing energy costs through intelligent consumption optimization and dynamic electricity pricing. The company provides the Heartbeat AI virtual power plant platform, photovoltaic systems, home batteries, heat pump solutions, and smart wallbox chargers. It promotes clean energy adoption by connecting decentralized systems into Europe's largest residential virtual power plant.

products.name: Heartbeat AI
products.description: AI-powered energy management platform connecting 500+ MW of distributed systems into Europe's largest residential virtual power plant, making 4.8 million automated decisions daily to optimize energy consumption based on weather and electricity prices

products.name: Solar Systems
products.description: Residential photovoltaic installations with premium panels and optimized roof configurations, professionally installed by certified local partners with integrated monitoring and 25-year performance warranties

products.name: Battery Storage
products.description: Home energy storage systems enabling self-consumption optimization, backup power during outages, and participation in virtual power plant trading through Heartbeat AI integration

products.name: Heat Pumps
products.description: Air-source and ground-source heat pump solutions for CO2-neutral heating and cooling, intelligently controlled by Heartbeat AI to run during periods of low electricity prices and high renewable availability

products.name: Wallbox Chargers
products.description: Smart EV charging stations with dynamic load management and solar surplus charging, integrated into the Heartbeat ecosystem for cost-optimized vehicle charging during off-peak hours

highlights.text: Nov 2025—Heartbeat AI opens to millions of existing solar systems, heat pumps and batteries for the first time
Oct 2025—1KOMMA5° breaks €100 million monthly orders milestone for first time
Jul 2025—Pre-IPO round extended with Sabanci Climate Ventures joining as new shareholder
Feb 2025—Record €520M revenue in 2024 announced with 36% organic growth and €10B target by 2030

2024—CEO Philipp Schröder honored with EY Entrepreneur Of The Year award in Sustainability category
2024—Heartbeat AI connects 500MW to Europe's largest residential virtual power plant
2023—Achieved unicorn status with €215M Series B funding round

1MG.name: Tata 1mg
1MG.tagline: India's leading digital healthcare platform—online pharmacy, teleconsultation, and diagnostics
1MG.overview: Developer of digital healthcare infrastructure and e-pharmacy platforms serving consumers across India with medicine delivery, diagnostic testing, and telemedicine services. The company focuses on online pharmacy fulfillment, at-home lab sample collection, and video consultations with licensed healthcare professionals. It helps patients access affordable medicines with up to 25% discounts, book diagnostic tests from NABL-accredited labs, and consult doctors across 25+ medical specialties. The company provides the 1mg online pharmacy, Tata 1mg Labs diagnostics, teleconsultation platform, and comprehensive health content database. It promotes healthcare accessibility through technology-enabled delivery networks and AI-powered health insights.

products.name: Online Pharmacy
products.description: E-pharmacy platform offering 2 lakh+ allopathic, homeopathic, and Ayurvedic medicines with up to 25% discounts, home delivery in 1000+ cities, and LegitScript-certified authenticity verification

products.name: Tata 1mg Labs
products.description: Diagnostic testing service with 2,000+ lab tests from 120+ NABL-accredited partner labs, featuring home sample collection, drone-enabled transport, and AI-powered health insights

products.name: Teleconsultation
products.description: Virtual healthcare platform enabling video and chat consultations with registered doctors across 25+ specialties including general physicians, gynecologists, dermatologists, and pediatricians

products.name: Health Content
products.description: Comprehensive medical information database featuring drug interactions, side effects, dosage guidelines, and health articles reviewed by licensed healthcare professionals

products.name: 30-Minute Delivery
products.description: Quick commerce medicine delivery service leveraging network of company-owned stores and partner outlets across 26 cities for urgent healthcare needs

highlights.text: Aug 2025—Tata 1mg holds 30% market share of India's e-pharmacy space, planning expansion to 3,000 offline stores
Jul 2025—FY25 revenue grows 22% to ₹2,392 crore with continued investment in omnichannel expansion
May 2025—Tata 1mg hybrid retail model analysis: reinventing Indian pharma retail with online-offline integration
2025—$200M funding talks with Novo Holdings, CPPIB, Permira amid valuation negotiations

funding_rounds.investors_html: Tata Digital acquired majority stake

21CO.name: 21.co
21CO.tagline: Making crypto accessible through institutional-grade exchange-traded products
21CO.overview: Developer of cryptocurrency exchange-traded products and digital asset infrastructure enabling institutional investors to access crypto markets through regulated financial instruments. The company focuses on designing, issuing, and managing physically-backed crypto ETPs across Bitcoin, Ethereum, and diversified crypto baskets. It helps institutional and retail investors gain exposure to digital assets through traditional brokerage accounts without direct custody complexities. The company provides crypto ETPs listed on major European exchanges, the ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF for US markets, and white-label technology infrastructure for asset managers. It promotes mainstream crypto adoption by bridging traditional finance with decentralized digital assets.

products.name: 21Shares ETPs
products.description: Suite of 55+ physically-backed cryptocurrency exchange-traded products covering Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, XRP, and diversified crypto baskets listed on European exchanges including SIX, Euronext, and Deutsche Börse

products.name: ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF (ARKB)
products.description: Spot Bitcoin ETF launched in partnership with ARK Invest in January 2024, offering US investors direct exposure to BTC with Chainlink proof-of-reserves integration for transparency

products.name: 21Shares Core Ethereum ETF (CETH)
products.description: Spot Ethereum ETF for US institutional investors providing regulated access to ETH through traditional brokerage accounts with competitive expense ratios

products.name: 21.co Technologies
products.description: White-label infrastructure platform enabling asset managers and financial institutions to launch their own crypto investment products with custody, compliance, and reporting solutions

highlights.text: Nov 2025—FalconX completes acquisition of 21Shares, combining ETP infrastructure with $2T trading volume prime brokerage
Sep 2025—21Shares reaches 50 listed crypto ETPs in Europe with $11B+ AUM globally
Dec 2024—21.co announces new operating structure with 21Shares and 21.co Technologies becoming separate entities
Feb 2024—ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF integrates Chainlink proof-of-reserves for transparency
Jan 2024—ARK 21Shares Spot Bitcoin ETF (ARKB) launches in US market
Sep 2022—Raises $25M at $2B valuation, becoming Switzerland's largest crypto unicorn

leadership.name: Massimo Siano
leadership.role: Managing Director, Head of Southern Europe

funding_rounds.investors_html: Marshall Wace (lead), World Innovation Lab

24M-TECHNOLOGIES.name: 24M Technologies
24M-TECHNOLOGIES.tagline: Revolutionizing battery manufacturing with SemiSolid technology for safer, cheaper, and more sustainable energy storage
24M-TECHNOLOGIES.overview: Developer of revolutionary SemiSolid battery manufacturing technology that transforms energy storage production. The company focuses on chemistry-agnostic electrode platforms that dramatically reduce manufacturing costs while improving safety, performance, and recyclability. It helps battery manufacturers, automotive OEMs, and grid storage providers deploy cleaner, more efficient production processes. The company provides SemiSolid electrode technology, Unit Cell architecture, ETOP manufacturing systems, and licensing partnerships. It promotes sustainable energy storage through simplified manufacturing and reduced environmental impact.

products.name: SemiSolid Battery Platform
products.description: Revolutionary battery architecture using thick SemiSolid electrodes that dramatically reduce manufacturing complexity and cost while improving energy density, safety characteristics, and recyclability compared to conventional lithium-ion cells through patented electrode formulations.

products.name: Unit Cell Technology
products.description: Patented modular cell architecture enabling simpler manufacturing with fewer components, eliminating complex lamination processes while providing uniform thermal management and scalable production capacity for diverse battery chemistries including LFP and NMC variants.

products.name: ETOP Manufacturing Process
products.description: Electrodes-to-Order Production system that eliminates conventional solvent drying steps, reducing capital equipment costs by up to fifty percent, energy consumption, and factory footprint while enabling faster production line deployment and lower environmental impact.

products.name: Grid Storage Solutions
products.description: Large-format SemiSolid battery systems optimized for utility-scale energy storage applications, providing enhanced cycle life, improved safety margins for stationary installations, and compatibility with renewable energy integration at commercial and industrial sites.

products.name: Technology Licensing
products.description: Comprehensive licensing program enabling global battery manufacturers to adopt SemiSolid technology, including technical training, manufacturing line design support, and ongoing process optimization assistance for partners in Japan, Thailand, and India.

highlights.text: Dec 2024—Kyocera doubles SemiSolid battery production capacity to 400 MWh for Japan market expansion
Dec 2024—24M and Kyocera win 2024 Electrochemical Society Technology Award for commercializing SemiSolid battery technology
Sep 2024—Raises $87M Series H at $1.3B valuation led by Nuovo+ to expand global licensing and manufacturing
Sep 2024—Opens 100 MWh pilot manufacturing facility in Thailand with Nuovo Energy partner
Sep 2024—Strategic investors Kyocera, ASAHI Kasei, DNP, and Lucas TVS participate in Series H round
2024—Total funding reaches over $500M across eight funding rounds since MIT spinout
Apr 2024—Kyocera announces major expansion plans for SemiSolid battery manufacturing in Japan domestic market
2024—Nuovo Energy Thailand facility begins commercial production using licensed SemiSolid technology platform

funding_rounds.investors_html: Nuovo+ (lead), Kyocera, ASAHI Kasei

2TM.name: 2TM Group (Mercado Bitcoin)
2TM.tagline: Latin America's largest digital assets ecosystem powering Mercado Bitcoin
2TM.overview: Operator of Latin America's largest digital assets ecosystem and cryptocurrency trading infrastructure. The company focuses on providing secure crypto exchange services, asset tokenization platforms, and digital investment products for retail and institutional clients across Brazil and Europe. It helps investors access cryptocurrency markets, tokenized securities, and digital asset custody services through regulated platforms. The company provides Mercado Bitcoin exchange, MB Tokens tokenization platform, and Mercado Bitcoin Portugal for European expansion. It promotes financial inclusion and cryptocurrency adoption across Latin American and European markets.

products.name: Mercado Bitcoin Exchange
products.description: Brazil's premier cryptocurrency trading platform offering spot trading, advanced order types, and institutional-grade security infrastructure for buying, selling, and storing digital assets across hundreds of cryptocurrency pairs with competitive fees.

products.name: MB Tokens Platform
products.description: Asset tokenization infrastructure enabling issuance of security tokens, real estate fractions, receivables, and other traditional assets on blockchain with full regulatory compliance under Brazilian securities laws and CVM oversight.

products.name: Mercado Bitcoin Portugal
products.description: European Union-licensed cryptocurrency exchange acquired through CriptoLoja, providing regulated digital asset services to customers across all EU member states from its Lisbon headquarters under Portuguese banking supervision.

products.name: MB Pro Trading
products.description: Professional trading interface designed for active traders and institutions featuring advanced charting tools, API access for algorithmic trading, enhanced liquidity pools, and reduced trading fees for high-volume market participants.

products.name: Digital Asset Custody
products.description: Institutional-grade cryptocurrency custody solutions with multi-signature security, cold storage infrastructure, insurance coverage, and regulatory-compliant segregated accounts for corporate clients and investment funds.

highlights.text: Jan 2022—Expands into Europe by acquiring CriptoLoja Portugal, gaining EU-wide operating license
Nov 2021—Raises $50M Series B extension from 10T and Tribe Capital, cementing unicorn status
Jul 2021—Closes record $200M Series B from SoftBank at $2.1B valuation, largest LatAm crypto funding ever
Jul 2021—Achieves unicorn status with $2.1B valuation, joining top 10 Latin American unicorns

2022—Secures EU-wide operating license through Portugal subsidiary for pan-European expansion
2021—Reports profitability streak since 2018, demonstrating sustainable business model in crypto
2021—Reaches $7B+ cumulative trading volume across Mercado Bitcoin exchange platform

58-DAOJIA.name: 58 Daojia (58到家)
58-DAOJIA.tagline: China's leading O2O platform for home and lifestyle services
58-DAOJIA.overview: Operator of China's leading on-demand home services marketplace connecting millions of customers with verified service professionals. The company focuses on delivering convenient, quality-assured home services through its mobile platform and proprietary order-matching technology. It helps Chinese consumers access cleaning, moving, childcare, elderly care, and beauty services with standardized pricing and vetted providers. The company provides home cleaning services, relocation assistance, nanny placement, caregiver matching, and at-home beauty treatments. It promotes professionalizing China's domestic services industry through technology-enabled quality control and worker training programs.

products.name: Home Cleaning Services
products.description: Professional residential and commercial cleaning services delivered by trained and verified cleaning professionals, featuring hourly or deep cleaning options with standardized quality protocols, real-time booking, and customer satisfaction guarantees.

products.name: Relocation & Moving Services
products.description: Comprehensive local and long-distance moving solutions including professional packing, furniture disassembly, secure transportation, and reassembly services with transparent pricing, damage protection insurance, and GPS tracking capabilities.

products.name: Childcare & Nanny Placement
products.description: Professional nanny and babysitter matching platform with background-verified caregivers, personalized matching algorithms based on family preferences, trial periods, and ongoing support for domestic helper employment arrangements.

products.name: Elderly Care Services
products.description: Professional in-home elderly care solutions connecting families with trained caregivers specializing in senior assistance, medical support coordination, companionship services, and specialized dementia care programs.

products.name: At-Home Beauty & Wellness
products.description: On-demand beauty and personal care services delivered to customers' homes, including haircuts, manicures, massage therapy, skincare treatments, and other wellness services from licensed professionals.

highlights.text: Sep 2020—Closes Series C funding round led by Sequoia Capital China to accelerate platform expansion
Oct 2015—Raises $300M Series A from Alibaba, KKR, and Ping An at unicorn valuation
2020—Total funding reaches $550M across multiple investment rounds from strategic investors

2019—Becomes largest home services platform in China by transaction volume and service provider count
2018—Launches standardized training programs for service providers to ensure quality consistency
2014—Founded as spin-off from 58.com to capture growing demand for O2O home services in China

funding_rounds.investors_html: Alibaba, KKR, Ping An

5IRE.name: 5ire
5IRE.tagline: The world's first sustainable blockchain—incentivizing UN Sustainable Development Goals
5IRE.overview: Developer of a fifth-generation blockchain ecosystem designed around the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals. The company focuses on building sustainable Web3 infrastructure through its unique Proof-of-Benefit consensus mechanism that rewards validators based on sustainability practices and ESG alignment. It helps enterprises, governments, and developers build environmentally conscious decentralized applications with built-in impact measurement. The company provides the 5ireChain Layer 1 blockchain, non-custodial wallet solutions, and developer grant programs. It promotes sustainable blockchain adoption by integrating ESG metrics directly into network consensus and governance mechanisms.

products.name: 5ireChain
products.description: Fifth-generation Layer 1 blockchain featuring the proprietary Proof-of-Benefit consensus mechanism that measures and rewards validators based on their sustainability practices, ESG scores, and contributions to UN Sustainable Development Goals.

products.name: 5ire Wallet
products.description: Non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet enabling secure storage and management of 5IRE tokens and interactions with sustainable dApps, featuring multi-chain support, biometric security, and seamless integration with the 5ireChain ecosystem.

products.name: 5ire Grants Program
products.description: Multi-million dollar developer funding initiative supporting innovative sustainable Web3 projects building on 5ireChain, providing technical mentorship, marketing support, and financial resources for SDG-aligned blockchain applications.

products.name: 5ire EVM
products.description: Ethereum Virtual Machine compatibility layer enabling developers to deploy existing Solidity smart contracts on 5ireChain with minimal modifications while benefiting from sustainability-focused consensus and lower carbon footprint.

products.name: 5ire Explorer
products.description: Blockchain explorer providing real-time visibility into 5ireChain transactions, validator performance, sustainability metrics, and network health statistics with detailed analytics on ESG impact measurements.

highlights.text: Aug 2024—Launches hybrid Layer 1 mainnet after processing over 1 million test transactions on testnet
Feb 2024—Announces $10M grant program to fund sustainable Web3 projects building on 5ireChain
Jul 2022—Raises $100M Series A from SRAM & MRAM at $1.5B valuation, becoming India's fastest blockchain unicorn
Jul 2022—Becomes India's fastest-growing blockchain unicorn within 10 months of founding
Jul 2022—Recognized as world's only sustainable blockchain unicorn focused on UN SDG alignment
Oct 2021—Closes $21M seed round from Alphabit, Marshland Capital, and other investors
2024—Introduces Proof-of-Benefit consensus mechanism incentivizing validators for SDG contributions
2021—Founded with mission to create sustainable blockchain aligned with United Nations Development Goals

funding_rounds.investors_html: Alphabit, Marshland Capital, Launchpool Labs, Moonrock Capital

6SENSE.name: 6sense
6SENSE.tagline: The leading account-based marketing platform powered by AI and predictive analytics
6SENSE.overview: Provider of the leading account-based marketing and revenue intelligence platform powered by artificial intelligence. The company focuses on identifying anonymous buyer intent signals and predicting which accounts are actively in-market for purchasing decisions. It helps B2B sales and marketing teams target high-value prospects, prioritize outreach efforts, and orchestrate personalized multi-channel campaigns. The company provides Revenue AI for intent prediction, Orchestration for campaign management, and Conversational Email for automated sales engagement. It promotes data-driven revenue operations through predictive analytics and AI-powered buyer behavior insights.

products.name: 6sense Revenue AI Platform
products.description: Comprehensive AI-powered revenue intelligence platform that identifies anonymous website visitors, predicts buying behavior, and reveals in-market accounts through analysis of billions of intent signals across the web.

products.name: Predictive Analytics Engine
products.description: Machine learning models trained on extensive B2B buyer data that predict purchase intent timing, account fit scores, and likelihood to buy, enabling sales teams to prioritize highest-value opportunities accurately.

products.name: Campaign Orchestration
products.description: Multi-channel campaign management platform enabling personalized advertising, email sequences, and sales outreach coordinated across accounts based on buying stage, persona, and intent signals.

products.name: Conversational Email
products.description: AI-powered email automation solution generating personalized sales engagement sequences, automating follow-ups, and qualifying leads through natural language processing and intelligent response handling.

products.name: RevvyAI Assistant
products.description: Conversational AI command center enabling sales and marketing teams to query signals, build audiences, and launch campaigns using natural language prompts, democratizing access to revenue intelligence.

highlights.text: Nov 2025—Launches RevvyAI conversational command center enabling natural language queries for signals and campaigns at Breakthrough 2025
Nov 2025—Named Gartner Magic Quadrant Leader for ABM Platforms fifth consecutive year with highest Ability to Execute score
Nov 2025—Co-founder Amanda Kahlow raises $30M for new AI sales automation startup 1mind
Oct 2024—Advances AI capabilities to unlock B2B revenue potential announced at Breakthrough 2024 conference
Jan 2022—Closes $200M Series E at $5.2B valuation led by Blue Owl and MSD Partners
2024—ARR exceeds $250M with continued strong growth in B2B revenue intelligence market
2024—Named leader in Forrester Wave B2B Revenue Marketing Platforms Q3 2024 evaluation
Sep 2025—Chris Ball appointed CEO with Jason Zintak transitioning to Executive Chairman

funding_rounds.investors_html: Blue Owl, MSD Partners, SoftBank
Insight Partners, Tiger Global
